invite.title: Invite a Business Owner
invite.description1: Know a business owner looking to streamline their operations? Share Dott with them!
invite.description2: Dott helps businesses automate scheduling, manage customer relationships, and handle paymentsâ€”all in one simple app. Your connection can save hours of administrative work each week.
invite.phoneHelperText: Include country code (e.g., +1 for US, +44 for UK)

invite.phoneValidationError: Please enter a valid phone number.
invite.errorMessage: Failed to send invitation. Please try again.

invite.emailMessage:
{{senderName}} has invited you to join Dott: Global Business Platform!

Hello,

I wanted to personally recommend Dott, a business management platform that has transformed how I run my operations.

Dott brings together everything you need in one place:
â€¢ Sales and customer management
â€¢ Inventory tracking and control
â€¢ Professional invoicing and payments
â€¢ Financial reporting and analytics
â€¢ Team collaboration tools
â€¢ AI Business insights and analytics
â€¢ Geofencing and location tracking
â€¢ Real-time business intelligence

Since implementing Dott, I've reduced administrative work by hours each week while gaining real-time insights into my business performance. The platform delivers enterprise-grade capabilities at a fraction of traditional software costs.

I believe Dott would be particularly valuable for your business operations and growth goals.

Get started for free forever today: https://dottapps.com

Best regards,
{{userName}}

importExport.title: Import/Export Data
importExport.description: Seamlessly migrate your business data in and out of Dott. Import from spreadsheets or other accounting software, and export your data in multiple formats. Our AI-powered field mapper makes importing data quick and accurate.

import.title: Import Data
import.description: Bring your existing data into Dott from Excel, QuickBooks, or other sources.
import.step1Title: Step 1: What would you like to import?
import.step2Title: Step 2: How would you like to import?

export.title: Export Data
export.description: Download your Dott data in various formats for backup or use in other applications.

products.label: Products/Services
products.description: Product catalog with prices and inventory

shopify.label: Shopify
shopify.description: Import products and customers from Shopify

aiFeature.title: New Feature: AI-Powered Data Mapper
aiFeature.description: Our intelligent field mapping system uses Claude AI to automatically match your data fields with Dott's database structure, making imports faster and more accurate than ever.

accessRestricted.title: Access Restricted
accessRestricted.message: Import/Export functionality is only available to Admin and Owner users.
